title: Privacy Notice
description: On this guild, the bot <@572020083635781668> is collecting data for a Discord data analysis video project of <@221905671296253953>. By acting on this discord, you are automatically accpet the collection of data described further below.

fields.name: ✅ What Data Will Be Collected?
fields.value:
◽ **Public Chat Messages**
Channel ID, Timestamp, Sender-Role-IDs, Message Content Length, Message Media Attachment Types (Image/Video/Link), Role Mentions

◽ **Online Status Activity**
Status counts, online status per roles and time

◽ **Member Join/Leave**
Timestamps when members are joining or leaving the server

◽ **Total Member Count**
Count of members on the guild over time

◽ **Reactions**
Used reaction count per message, per reaction name, per channel

◽ **Voice Activity**
When voice channels get joined or left

fields.name: ❌ What Data Will NOT Be Collected?
fields.value:
◽ **NO** specific user IDs, user tags, nick names or something like this will be logged
◽ **NO** specific message content, media or something else will be logged
◽ **NO** specific user activity or behavior will be logged
